original_text: Peter answered Simon, ‘I pray that God will destroy you and your money! You think that you can buy this gift with your money! It is very wrong for you to think that. It is God who gives that gift.
korean_text: 베드로가 이르되 네가 하나님의 선물을 돈 주고 살 줄로 생각하였으니 네 은과 네가 함께 망할지어다

sentences.original_text: I pray that God will destroy you and your money!
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 당신과 당신의 돈을 멸하시기를 기도합니다!

sentences.original_text: You think that you can buy this gift with your money!
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 돈으로 이 선물을 살 수 있다고 생각합니다!

sentences.original_text: It is very wrong for you to think that.
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇게 생각하는 것은 당신에게 매우 잘못된 일입니다.

sentences.original_text: It is God who gives that gift.
